card_text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster from your GY. While a Field Spell is face-up on the field, your opponent cannot target LIGHT or DARK monsters you control with card effects. You can target cards on the field, up to the number of face-up Field Spells on the field; banish them. You can only use this effect of "Chaos Daedalus" once per turn.
